Michael K. Kelley and Lenore T. Kelley, Plaintiffs, Appellants
v.

No. 00-2543.

United States Court of Appeals, First Circuit.

February 8, 2002.

1

THIS OPINION HAS BEEN WITHDRAWN FROM THE BOUND VOLUME AT THE REQUEST OF THE COURT. SEE 288 F.3d 1
